Text: as always, great job, AVIGUY, big thanx!  :)  Could i be so bold to ask if you could have a go att the new Battlestar Galactica series, "Blood and Chrome"? The episodes now out there is in "wrong" format  ;)

hello2006:

Just showed up, and I'm uploading them (1,2,3-4, 5-6) here, just about ... NOW
